name: FARSIDE prototype
description:
AN UNEXPECTED ADVENTURE
Embark on the alien wilderness, take the drone on foot and embark on the journey of survival


A PLANET FULL OF UNKNOWN CREATURES
Strange planets are full of strange creatures. Only by defeating them to move on


DRIVE VEHICLE ACROSS THE WASTLANDS
Get on the off-road armored vehicle, the gravel is flying under the speeding wheels, across mountains and wades, and attack powerful enemies.


FIND OUT THE COVERED SECRETS
The deadly colony hides a greater crisis, waiting for you to discover


FIGHT A WAY TO THE END
Live and keep moving forward to reach the goal
